full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHRO BO RDO RJE MKHA' 'GRO MA'I SBYIN SREG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,('DI LTAR ZA BYED MKHA' 'GRO MA'I SBYIN SREG BYED PA NI SPYIR SDIG SGRIB SBYONG BA DANG, KHYAD PAR DAM TSIG NYAMS CHAGS BSKONG BA DANG, BAR CHAD BZLOG PA LA SHIN TU BSNGAGS CING BYIN RLABS CHE BAR GSUNGS LA, RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO'I NANG THUGS SRAS GCIG MKHAS GRUB DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG PO LA SNYAN RGYUD PA'I MAN NGAG KHYAD PAR YIN PAS YID CHES KYI DANG PO BRTAN POS NYAMS SU BLANG BAR BYA'O, ,ZHES PA 'DI YANG SNGA PHYIR DU STZAL DON GNYER CAN MANG POS YANG YANG BSKUL NYE CHAR DAD LDAN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG RGYUN DU NYAMS LEN BYA PHYIR ZA BYED RDO RJE MKHA' 'GRO MA'I @004B SBYIN SREG BYA TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, 'JAM MGON BLA MA'I SNYAN RGYDU 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS PHO BRANG CHEN PO TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG BDE BA CAN DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL PO'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHEE PHYOGS DUS KUN TU 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
